metadata.description: Number of FortiGate VM instances to deploy

Naming prefix for all deployed resources. The FortiGate VMs will have the suffix '-fgt-a' and '-fgt-b'. For example if the prefix is 'acme-01' the FortiGates will be named 'acme-01-fgt-a' and 'acme-01-fgt-b'
Identifies whether to to use PAYG (on demand licensing) or BYOL license model (where license is purchased separately
Identifies whether to to use PAYG (on demand licensing) or BYOL license model (where license is purchased separately)
Identifies whether to to use PAYG (on demand licensing) or BYOL license model (where license is purchased separately
Indicates the instance Architecture of the VM deployment. Intel/AMD or ARM
Select the image version supporting Generation 2 VMs
The ARM template provides a basic configuration. Additional configuration can be added here.
Enable session synchronisation between FortiGate peers (Azure Load Balancer might prevent session pick in certain flows).
Enable/Disable probe response on interface for load balancer.
Virtual Machine size selection - must be an instance that supports 4 NICs
Install an external load balancer and subnet or not.
Install an external load balancer and subnet or not.
choose how you want to get internet connectivity when you use internal loadbalancer

Deploy FortiGate VMs in an Availability Set or Availability Zones. If Availability Zones deployment is selected but the location does not support Availability Zones an Availability Set will be deployed. If Availability Zones deployment is selected and Availability Zones are available in the location, FortiGate A will be placed in Zone 1, FortiGate B will be placed in Zone 2
Accelerated Networking enables direct connection between the VM and network card. Only available on 2 CPU F/Fs and 4 CPU D/Dsv2, D/Dsv3, E/Esv3, Fsv2, Lsv2, Ms/Mms and Ms/Mmsv2
Accelerated connections provides an enhanced bandwidth at an additional cost
Accelerated Connections Auxiliary SKU bandwidth Tiers
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Name of the Azure virtual network, required if utilizing and existing VNET. If no name is provided the default name will be the Resource Group Name as the Prefix and '-vnet' as the suffix
Resource Group containing the existing virtual network, leave blank if a new VNET is being utilized
Subnet 1 start address, 2 consecutive private IPs are required
Subnet 2 start address, 2 consecutive private IPs are required
FortiManager IP or DNS name to connect to on port TCP/541
FortiManager serial number to add the deployed FortiGate into the FortiManager
By default, the deployment will use Azure Marketplace images. In specific cases, using BYOL custom FortiGate images can be deployed. This requires a reference

variables.fmgCustomData:
[if(equals(parameters('fortiManager'),'yes'),concat('
config system central-management
set type fortimanager
set fmg ',parameters('fortiManagerIP'),'
set serial-number ', parameters('fortiManagerSerial'), '
end
config system interface
edit port1
append allowaccess fgfm
end
config system interface
edit port2
append allowaccess fgfm
end
'),'')]
variables.customDataHeader:
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="12345"
MIME-Version: 1.0

--12345
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="config"
variables.customDataBodyShared:
[concat('config system global
set allow-traffic-redirect disable
end
config system sdn-connector
edit AzureSDN
set type azure
next
end
config system probe-response
set mode http-probe
end
', parameters('fortiGateAdditionalCustomData'), '
')]
variables.customDataLicenseHeader:
--12345
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="license"
variables.licenseBYOL: [createArray(parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL1'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL2'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL3'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL4'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL5'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL6'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL7'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseBYOL8'))]
variables.licenseFortiFlex: [createArray(parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex1'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex2'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex3'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex4'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex5'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex6'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex7'), parameters('fortiGateLicenseFortiFlex8'))]

copy.name: interfaceCustomData2Nic
copy.input:
[concat('config system interface
edit port1
set ip ',variables('sn1IP')[copyIndex('interfaceCustomData2Nic',1)],'/',variables('sn1CidrObject').cidr,'
set mode static
set description external
set allowaccess ping ssh https', if(parameters('fortiGateProbeResponse'),' probe-response','') ,'
next
edit port2
set ip ',variables('sn2IP')[copyIndex('interfaceCustomData2Nic',1)],'/',variables('sn2CidrObject').cidr,'
set mode static
set allowaccess ping ssh https', if(parameters('fortiGateProbeResponse'),' probe-response','') ,'
set description internal
next
end
config router static
edit 1
set dst 0.0.0.0/0
set device port1
set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 2
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
set device port2
next
edit 3
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port2
set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
next
end
')]

copy.name: interfaceCustomData1Nic
copy.input:
[concat('config system interface
edit port1
set ip ',variables('sn2IP')[copyIndex('interfaceCustomData1Nic',1)],'/',variables('sn1CidrObject').cidr,'
set mode static
set description internal
set allowaccess ping ssh https ', if(parameters('fortiGateProbeResponse'),' probe-response','') ,'
next
end
config router static
edit 1
set dst 0.0.0.0/0
set device port1
set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 2
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
next
end
')]

copy.name: fgspCustomData
copy.input:
[if(lessOrEquals(parameters('fortiGateCount'),8),concat('config system ha
set session-pickup enable
set session-pickup-connectionless enable
set session-pickup-nat enable
set session-pickup-expectation enable
set override disable
end
config system standalone-cluster
', variables('fgspPeerCustomData')[copyIndex('fgspCustomData')],'
end
'),'')]

output.value:
[if( greater(parameters('fgtnr'),parameters('count')), '', concat(if(and(greater(parameters('count'),0),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),1))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[1],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),1),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),2))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[2],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),2),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),3))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[3],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),3),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),4))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[4],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),4),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),5))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[5],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),5),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),6))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[6],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),6),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),7))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[7],'
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),7),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),8))),concat('edit 0
set peer-ip ',parameters('sn2IP')[8],'
next
'),'')))]

[if( greater(parameters('fgtnr'),parameters('count')), '', concat(if(and(greater(parameters('count'),0),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),1))),concat('edit 0
set peerip ',parameters('sn2IP')[1],'
set syncvd root
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),1),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),2))),concat('edit 0
set peerip ',parameters('sn2IP')[2],'
set syncvd root
next
'),''), if(and(greater(parameters('count'),2),not(equals(parameters('fgtnr'),3))),concat('edit 0

set syncvd root

set syncvd root

set syncvd root

'),'')))]
